name: Pollaka
description:
Pollaka is a game focused on the emotional experience of the player with puzzle and interactive elements, it tells the story of Pollaka, a cute little girl with brown hair and her grandfather, a sweet man with white hair. In the game you will have photos that have been torn and as a grown Pollaka, will have to glue it back together to "enter" and remember the memories that she had with her grandfather, which can be interacted through minigames. The game is divided in three chapters: childhood, adolescence and adulthood.
